page.title: 10 SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: What fears do the people of Dartford have? People were interviewed about the sorts of things that frightened them. The children were most frightened at the thought of war.Their next most common fears were concerned with the possibility of murder. A few children expressed fears of such things as spiders, snakes,rats and ghosts although such fears were not based on any real exerience. Most adults were concerned about nuclear war and the possibility of being attacked on the streets. An 11 year old boy writes"I am worried that if a nuclear missile hit Greenham Common it would blow up the whole of England.I am also worried that Dartford may be flooded again"
